trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_SEQ_00<tab>There is still much Stigma-4 would learn of the Grebuloffs' new home.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested sample to the analysis unit.
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_SEQ_02<tab>Report to Stigma-4.

TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> from the Elysian seas.)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the analysis unit.)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> from the Elysian seas.)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the analysis unit.)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> from the Elysian seas.)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the analysis unit.)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_TODO_01<tab>Report to Stigma-4.

TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_STIGMA4_000_001<tab>Analysis indicates that the Grebuloffs continue to abide on Elysion without difficulty. However, data insufficiencies remain regarding the oceans created through their influence on dynamis.
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_STIGMA4_000_002<tab>With sufficient data, it will be possible to preserve such ocean environments and improve Grebuloff well-being. Initiating research and analysis protocol...
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_STIGMA4_000_003<tab>Samples of limestone coral are required to proceed with analysis. Once procured, please deposit the samples in the analysis unit.
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_STIGMA4_000_004<tab>Elysian cucumber samples are required to proceed with analysis. Once procured, please deposit the samples in the analysis unit.
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_STIGMA4_000_005<tab>An Elysian nudibranch sample is required to proceed with analysis. Once procured, please deposit the sample in the analysis unit.
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_STIGMA4_000_006<tab>For maximum efficiency, use of gold salmon roe is strongly advised. All proceeds go to Omicron enhancement initiatives.
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_OMICRON04614_000_010<tab>Scanning inventory... Unidentified substances detected. Potential value and utilization factors...unclear. Standing by for oceanic samples.
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_OMICRON04614_000_011<tab>Scanning inventory... Oceanic samples detected. Please insert for analysis.
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_OMICRON04614_000_012<tab>Analyzing... Sample possesses bacteria given to releasing foreign particulates. Olfactory sensors reaching critical.
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_OMICRON04614_000_013<tab>Conclusion: oceanic life-forms are prone to...unfavorable odor. Additional specimens required for further analysis.
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_OMICRON04614_000_014<tab>Conclusion: ocean life-forms remain prone to unfavorable odor. Probability of fragrant life unlikely. Additional specimens required for further analysis.
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_STIGMA4_000_015<tab>Report from analysis unit received. Your contribution was deemed beneficial to research on Elysion's oceanic environment.

TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_STIGMA4_000_016<tab>However, data insufficiencies remain. If discovered bacteria is present in all oceanic life-forms, verification of potential dissemination to other non-oceanic hosts is required.

TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_STIGMA4_000_017<tab>Proposal: submerge the redolent, fluffy manager in ocean water, and monitor odor fluctuations. Upon conclusion of this experiment, deployment of military-grade lasers may be authorized for decontamination purposes.
TEXT_BANOMI108_04614_STIGMA4_000_018<tab>Periodic analysis of new specimens is required for continued research and environmental preservation. Your future cooperation is greatly appreciated.
